short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Right-click any image to convert it into a DXF file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Image to DXF Converter is a simple yet powerful tool that lets you convert online images (e.g., PNG, JPEG) into AutoCAD-compatible DXF files directly from your browser. The generated DXF files embed raster images as references, preserving their original quality, resolution, and colors. This makes it perfect for laser engraving, CNC workflows, and CAD projects, where precise image-to-vector handling is essential.

With an intuitive right-click workflow, this addon saves you time and effort by generating DXF files that are ready for import into AutoCAD, Adobe Illustrator, FreeCAD, or your laser engraving software.
